parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The post includes a COD AEP: 13240004, which is a valid CMF number. This strongly suggests electoral propaganda.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post clearly identifies Petru Farago as a candidate for the Chamber of Deputies, specifying his position on the ballot (Position 1).  This fulfills Article 36 (7) - a.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>The post is a paid advertisement on Facebook, a public platform.  Given the targeting data (location, age, gender), it's clearly intended to reach a wide audience in Arad County, Romania, and not just a select few. This fulfills Article 36 (7) - c.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The primary objective of the post is to promote Petru Farago's candidacy. The message ("Position 1 on the ballot for the Chamber of Deputies") directly encourages voters to vote for him.  The visual element (a picture of the candidate) further reinforces this objective. This fulfills Article 36 (7) - c.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post lacks any journalistic elements. It doesn't provide news, analysis, or opinions; instead, it's purely promotional material for a political candidate.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The post does not express a personal opinion; it's a direct appeal for votes.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>2632021697008160</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post fulfills all the criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It refers directly to a candidate (Petru Farago), is used during the electoral campaign (although the end date is given as 1732867200, which needs further investigation to determine if it's after the official end of the campaign), has an explicitly electoral objective (to garner votes), and is clearly targeted at a wide audience via a paid Facebook advertisement. The presence of the CMF number further strengthens this conclusion.  The only potential mitigating factor is the end date, which requires verification against the official electoral calendar. However, even if the date is within the legal timeframe, the content itself is clearly electoral propaganda.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate> <name>PETRU FARAGO</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>RMDSZ</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
SC KLING CONSULTING SRL, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea, după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, a unei postări pe Facebook (ID: 2632021697008160) cu conținut electoral, care promovează candidatura lui PETRU FARAGO pentru Camera Deputaților, specificând poziția sa pe buletinul de vot (Poziția 1), având ca efect electoral creșterea numărului de voturi pentru acesta. Postarea, care a beneficiat de o cheltuială de publicitate de sub 100 RON, a atins între 2000 și 3000 de impresii, cu o estimare a acoperirii de 10.000 - 50.000 de persoane, în județul Arad, conform datelor din Facebook Ad Library.  Prezența codului CMF (COD AEP: 13240004) confirmă natura electorală a postării.  Indiferent de data de încheiere a campaniei electorale, conținutul postării constituie propagandă electorală, conform articolului 36 (7) din LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006, întrucât se referă direct la un candidat, este utilizată în perioada campaniei electorale, are un obiectiv electoral clar și se adresează publicului larg.  Datele de contact ale advertiserului sunt disponibile în Facebook Ad Library: faragopeter@rmdsz.ro și +40728968056.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
